name: @beep/db-admin
description: A library for migrations, seeds & db admin

scripts.build: pnpm build-esm && pnpm build-cjs && pnpm build-annotate
scripts.clean: rm -rf .tsbuildinfo node_modules coverage .next out dist build .turbo
scripts.db:generate: TSX_TSCONFIG_PATH=./tsconfig.tsx.json NODE_OPTIONS='--import tsx' pnpm dotenvx drizzle-kit generate
scripts.db:migrate: TSX_TSCONFIG_PATH=./tsconfig.tsx.json NODE_OPTIONS='--import tsx' pnpm dotenvx drizzle-kit migrate
scripts.db:push: TSX_TSCONFIG_PATH=./tsconfig.tsx.json NODE_OPTIONS='--import tsx' pnpm dotenvx drizzle-kit push
scripts.db:studio: TSX_TSCONFIG_PATH=./tsconfig.tsx.json NODE_OPTIONS='--import tsx' pnpm dotenvx drizzle-kit studio
